description.raw:
| Entity | Components |
| -------- | ------------------ |
| World | Name, World | 
| Model | Pose, Name, ParentEntity, Model	 | 
| Link | Pose, Name, ParentEntity, Link | 
| Collision | Pose, Name, ParentEntity, Collision | 
| Visual | Pose, Name, ParentEntity, Visual | 

I recommend taking a look at `SimulationRunner_TEST`.

TODOs:

* Store `sdf::Collision` into `ignition::gazebo::components::Collision`
* Sort out the `Each` function because it's currently returning all entities.
